text: The Keep is a 1983 British American World War II horror movie directed by Michael Mann and based on the 1981 novel of the same name by F. Paul Wilson. It stars Scott Glenn, Alberta Watson, JÃ¼rgen Prochnow, Robert Prosky, Gabriel Byrne, Ian McKellen and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 horror movies Category:1983 war movies Category:American horror movies Category:American war movies Category:British horror movies Category:British war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Mann Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in Wales Category:Movies set in Romania Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Keep (movie)
